inputs.name: url
inputs.title: Standalone FHIR Endpoint
inputs.description: URL of the FHIR endpoint used by standalone applications

inputs.name: bulk_server_url
inputs.title: Bulk Data FHIR URL
inputs.description: The URL of the Bulk FHIR server.

inputs.name: bearer_token
inputs.title: Bulk Data Authorization Bearer Token
inputs.description: The authorization bearer token for the Bulk FHIR server.

inputs.name: group_id
inputs.title: Group ID
inputs.description: The Group ID associated with the group of patients to be exported.

inputs.name: bulk_timeout
inputs.title: Export Times Out after (1-600)
inputs.description:
While testing, Inferno waits for the server to complete the exporting task.
          If the calculated totalTime is greater than the timeout value specified here,
          Inferno bulk client stops testing. Please enter an integer for the maximum wait time in seconds.
          If timeout is less than 1, Inferno uses default value 180.
          If the timeout is greater than 600 (10 minutes), Inferno uses the maximum value 600.
